author: Bloomberg News
title: Maple Leaf Foods, Spam-maker Hormel paying workers bonuses to keep plants going
description: Cash bonuses, pay raises and extended sick leave
content:
Some North American meat processors are offering plant workers bonuses as their already-gruelling jobs become even more critical amid the coronavirus threat.
Spam-maker Hormel Foods Corp. and Maple Leaf Foods Inc., Canada’s largest food processor, are offeri… [+898 chars]
